articles.title: Exclusive-Two senior Grab executives quit as company rejigs unit to stem losses - sources - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE -     Two top executives at Grab Holdings' fintech business have quit, adding to other senior departures in recent months, as the Southeast Asian ride-hailing and delivery firm rejigs the key unit at the loss-making group, two sources said.
